name: Blue Sapphire Ring
description: Manifesting love with every sparkle, the Reverie Diamonds Ring is a timeless gift to promise a lifetime together with your beloved. Set with a round brilliant diamond centre stone that is encircled by a glittering diamond halo, this ring is elegantly crafted with a tapered yellow gold band accented with side diamonds.
